featured.text: This was to ensure that no single and powerful noble family could seize the title and pass it to the next generation.

definition.zh_def: 書籍、文章或其他作品的名稱，通常位於封面或標題頁上。
definition.en_def: The name of a book, article, or other work, typically found on the cover or title page.
definition.example: The title of her new novel is very intriguing.
